<h3 id="X35822">X(35822) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st KENMOTU-FREE-VERTICES TO ANTI-ARTZT</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4+6*S*a^2+(b^2+c^2)*a^2-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(35822) = X(371)+2*X(3070) = X(371)-4*X(7583) = 2*X(371)+X(35820) = 2*X(485)+X(35832) = X(3070)+2*X(7583) = 4*X(3070)-X(35820) = 2*X(3103)+X(35866) = 8*X(7583)+X(35820) = 2*X(10665)+X(35836) = 4*X(32787)+X(35820) = 2*X(35641)+X(35842)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(2)</p>
<p>X(35822) lies on these lines:
{2,372}, {3,8960}, {4,1327}, {5,6420}, {6,13}, {20,6453}, {30,371}, {61,18587}, {62,18586}, {140,6454}, {376,3068}, {382,3592}, {397,15765}, {398,18585}, {428,35764}, {486,3545}, {491,32833}, <p>
X(35822) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3070, 32787}, {35698, 35878}<br>
X(35822) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (371, 32787), (32787, 7583), (32808, 639), (35823, 5309)<br>
X(35822) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 8960, 35812), (6, 381, 35823), (6, 6564, 6565), (6, 13665, 6564), (13, 14, 6564), (371, 3070, 35820), (372, 485, 10576), (381, 35823, 6565), (485, 1587, 372), (3068, 6560, 6200), (3068, 23267, 6560), (3070, 7583, 371), (3163, 18390, 35823), (3545, 7581, 19053), (3545, 14241, 31412), (3545, 19053, 486), (5476, 7753, 35823), (6564, 35823, 381), (7581, 14241, 3545), (7581, 31412, 486), (13665, 18512, 6), (19053, 31412, 3545), (31715, 31718, 1327)<br>
</p>
